data_table.description: Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: RPAAFLAG
variable.description: RPAAFLAG [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA01
variable.description: [Cough]. Usually have a cough? Q1 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA02
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually cough as much as 4 to 6 times a day, 4 or more days out of the week? Q2 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA03
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually cough at all on getting up, or first thing in the morning? Q3 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA04
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually cough at all during the rest of the day or at night? Q4 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA05
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually cough like this on most days for 3 consecutive months or more during the year? Q5 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA06
variable.description: [Cough]. Number years had this cough. Q6 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA07
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually bring up phlegm from your chest? Q7 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA08
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually bring up phlegm like this as much as twice a day, 4 or more days out of the week? Q8 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA09
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually bring up phlegm at all on getting up, or first thing in the morning? Q9 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA10
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually bring up phlegm at all during the rest of the day or at night? Q10 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA11
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you bring up phlegm like this on most days for 3 consecutive months or more during the year? Q11 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA12
variable.description: [Cough]. Number years had trouble with phlegm. Q12 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA13
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Does your chest ever sound wheezy or whistling when you have a cold? Q13 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA14
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Does your chest ever sound wheezy or whistling apart from colds? Q14 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA15
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Does your chest sound wheezy or whistling most days or nights? Q15 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA16
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Number years this wheezy or whistling sound been present. Q16 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA17
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Short Of Breath Wheezing Attack? Q17 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA18
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Age at first attack. Q18 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA19
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Have you had 2 or more such episodes? Q19 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA20
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Have you ever required medicine or treatment for these attacks? Q20 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA21
variable.description: [Breathlessness]. Are you disabled from walking by any condition other than heart or lung disease? Q21 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA22
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Are you troubled by shortness of breath when hurrying on the level or walking up a slight hill? Q22 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA23
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Do you have to walk slower than people of your age on the level because of breathlessness? Q23 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA24
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Ever have to stop for breath when walking at our own pace on the level? Q24 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA25
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Ever stop for breath after walking about 100 yards (or after a few minutes) on the level? Q25 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA26
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Too breathless to leave the house or breathless on dressing or undressing? Q26 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA27
variable.description: [Bronchitis]. Ever had chronic bronchitis? Q27 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA28
variable.description: [Bronchitis]. Still have chronic bronchitis? Q28 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA29
variable.description: [Bronchitis]. Was chronic bronchitis confirmed by a doctor? Q29 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA30
variable.description: [Bronchitis]. Age chronic bronchitis started. Q30 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA31
variable.description: [Emphysema]. Ever had emphysema? Q31 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA32
variable.description: [Bronchitis]. Still have emphysema? Q32 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA33
variable.description: [Bronchitis]. Was emphysema confirmed by a doctor? Q33 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA34
variable.description: [Bronchitis]. Age emphysema started. Q34 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA35
variable.description: [Asthma]. Ever had asthma? Q35 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA36
variable.description: [Asthma]. Was asthma confirmed by a doctor? Q36 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA37
variable.description: [Asthma]. Age asthma started Q37 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA38
variable.description: [Asthma]. Still have asthma? Q38 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA39
variable.description: [Asthma]. Age asthma stopped. Q39 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA40
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you sit. Q40 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA41
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you stand. Q41 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA42
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you walk. Q42 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA43
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you lift heavy loads. Q43 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA44
variable.description: [Work activity]. After working are you physically tired. Q44 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA45
variable.description: [Work activity]. At work do you sweat. Q45 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA46
variable.description: [Work activity]. In comparison with others of your own age do you think your work is physically. Q46 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA47
variable.description: [Sports]. Exercise or play sports? Q47 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA48
variable.description: [Sports]. Most frequent sport or exercise code 1. Q48 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA48A
variable.description: [Sports]. Specify sport or exercise activity. Q48a [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA49
variable.description: [Sports]. Hours per week do Q48 [which sport or exercise do you do most frequently] activity. Q49 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA50
variable.description: [Sports]. Months per year do Q48 [which sport or exercise do you do most frequently] activity. Q50 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA51
variable.description: [Sports]. Any other exercises or play other sports? Q51 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA52
variable.description: [Sports]. Second most frequent sport or exercise code 2. Q52 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA52A
variable.description: [Sports]. Specify sport or exercise activity. Q52a [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA53
variable.description: [Sports]. Hours per week do Q52 [what is your second most frequent sport or exercise] activity. Q53 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA54
variable.description: [Sports]. Months per year do Q52 [what is your second most frequent sport or exercise] activity. Q54 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA55
variable.description: [Sports]. Any other sports or exercises? Q55 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA56
variable.description: [Sports]. Third most frequent sport or exercise code 3. Q56 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA56A
variable.description: [Sports]. Specific sport or exercise activity. Q56a [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA57
variable.description: [Sports]. Hours per week do Q56 [what is your third most frequent sport or exercise] activity. Q57 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA58
variable.description: [Sports]. Months per year do Q56 [what is your third most frequent sport or exercise] activity. Q58 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA59
variable.description: [Sports]. Any other sports or exercises? Q59 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA60
variable.description: [Sports]. Fourth most frequent sport or exercise code 4. Q60 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA60A
variable.description: [Sports]. Specify sport or exercise activity. [BACK EXERCISES, BENDING STRETCHING, BRISK WALKING, EXERCISE ROUTINE, EXERCISES, EXERCISES AT HOME, EXERCISES IN HOME, GARDENING, ISOMETRICS, KICKBALL, KNEE BENDS, MACHINES FOR LEG BACK, NAUTALIS MACH. HEA. CLUB, OFFICIATING GAMES, OFFICIATING GAMES, OFFICIATING GAMES, OWNWINDO/CLEAN/LAUN/COOK, PLAYING YARD GAMES, PULL UPS, VARIETY, VARIOUS ACTIVITIES, VOLUNTEER ESCORT]. Q60a [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA61
variable.description: [Sports]. Hours per week for Q60 [what is your fourth most frequent sport or exercise] activity. Q61 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA62
variable.description: [Sports]. Months per year for Q60 [what is your fourth most frequent sport or exercise] activity. Q62 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA63
variable.description: [Sports]. Do you do other exercises or play other sports? Q63 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA64
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time would you say you play sports or exercise. Q64 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA65
variable.description: [Leisure time]. In comparison with others of your own age do you think your physical activity during leisure time is. Q65 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA66
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time do you sweat. Q66 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA67
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time do you watch television. Q67 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA68
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time do you walk. Q68 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA69
variable.description: [Leisure time]. During leisure time do you bicycle. Q69 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA70
variable.description: [Other activities]. How many minutes do you walk and/or bicycle per day and from work to shopping? Q70 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA71
variable.description: [Other activities]. Have you done any heavy physical activity within the last 12 hours? Q71 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA72
variable.description: [Other activities]. Number flights of stairs climbed each day. Q72 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA74
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Method of data collection. Q74 [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RPAA71MN
variable.description: [Other activities]. Time in minutes since heavy physical activity [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Respiratory Symptoms and Physical Activity Form, exam 1]
